text:
@politico Vice President Mike Pence said new outbreaks of the coronavirus may be arising because younger Americans aren’t abiding by federal guidance
-- You know who isn't abiding by federal guidance? That's right, @realDonaldTrump and @VP.
Failure in leadership. 
#UnfitForOffice.
